summary: When Chloe (Kristen Dalton) and Michael Carpenter rent out the cottage behind their house to charming romance novelist, Robert Mars (David Arquette) their American dream soon turns into a suburban nightmare.
cast: David Arquette|Kristen Dalton|Victor Browne|Morissa O'Mara|Alana O'Mara|Franny Hocking|Ken Baumann|Lorraine Nicholson|Bellamy Young|Rome Shadanloo|Kyle Slabotsky|Melanie Aitkenhead|Barbara Jean Barrielle|Charlotte Barrielle|Darren Dalton|Shannon Lewis-Reddy|Paige Segal|Matthew Solomowitz|Moira Squier|Laurent Turlure
keywords: escaping from bonds|tenant|two word title|mother son relationship|husband wife relationship
title: The Cottage
